name: The begin of a great Adventure !
name_original: The begin of a great Adventure !
description:
Welp, I did the programming and the writing. I used all three hours, same for my colleague (which did the music). Since I'm not a god, I had to use royalties-free assets for the graphics. In this case, they come from uncle mugen, jane_runs_fast and the characters by sutemo.

Btw, I totally overscope the game, so... yeah. Only chapter one is available.

Laura Crossheart : programming and writting

Tice : Music (He doesn't have an itchio.... so, his website : ticetunes.com

@ticetunes on Twitter
Ticetunes on SoundCloud)

Royalties-Free assets :

Backround art : Uncle mugen and jane_run_fast https://lemmasoft.renai.us/forums/viewtopic.php?t=46378

https://lemmasoft.renai.us/forums/viewtopic.php?f=52&t=17302&start=585#p434985

Character art : sutemo https://sutemo.itch.io/female-character
